title: For all shaco players
body:
(disclaimer) I am missing the game modes like urf and acention when are theys coming back please some one help me!!!

*Shaco Summoners - {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:14}} 

*Shaco Items for jg - {{item:3724}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3146}}  and any thing that does hp/mana/cd/resistance. i go hybrid cause its makes your E op and the infinity edge helps with clearing waves when they go supperminions...

*Shaco Play Style - Start with W every time in any role he can go any role but better jg and mid, i play by start putting down my boxes at 1min starting at red. get Q after u lvl 2 go to there blue and Q over the wall, and try steal blue and get first blood (unless u r vsing some one like aatrox or zac where they can stall with there pasives) you should be lvl 3. after u done that gank a lain that is doing the lane doing the worst (the one that is getting pushed) [if your lvl2 invade fails] - go to your jg farm till lvl 6 with ganks inbetween that way u can survive easyer espeshaly vsing a WW.

fell free to add me! Snowdr0ppings i can teach u some stuff with shaco over skype u can ask questions on a human level thanks!

SHARE PLEASE AND HAPPY JUNGLING!

replies.body: ad shaco is really the only viable option and even then he's really only good in duo ques or with incredibly skilled players who know how to control with him.
That build is less than effective. Pick full AD or full AP. and full AD has been better ever since box duration nerf, especially with removal of DFG.
i did not notice a nerf of the box and thank u for the help
I think its an old nerf, but it still really affected the box

i did not notice it i always put down my boxes at 1min and started playing as shaco again when some one said "when is the last time you played shaco? i miss winning every game your play jg" i loled and played him

> [{quoted}](name=Snowdr0ppings,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=UmKqi7QE,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-16T04:27:10.688+0000)
>
> i did not notice it i always put down my boxes at 1min and started playing as shaco again when some one said "when is the last time you played shaco? i miss winning every game your play jg" i loled and played him

Place at 0:56. Also if you like to split your boxes between blue and gromp, place 2 at gromp, or else by the time u are finished gromp with 1 box the 2nd box you placed will have despawned.
thanks i just tryed that it worked well

i forgot to put the other play styles at top, mid, and bot (he is not a adc he is a supp do not ask why please)

*Shaco mid - stay at tower farming minions put boxes at the river's entries/exits to counter ganks

*Shaco top - push and put boxes in triangals behind your minions that way if some one runs into it 1 box fears into the other fearing into the 3rd (really good in Hybrid)

*Shaco bot - put W in bushes and use it as a meat sheild for pulls from thresh and blitz cause it can take skill shots and basic attacks before it goes invis, when they go to gank u when u have boxes in the river u know when they r coming (scuddle crab sets off the box so take scudde while u r there for dragon and river control) the boxes in the bushes at bot they can not sit in there. in total he does not need to buy a ton of wards or even get a sightstone {{champion:35}}
Meh I like shaco where you can easily kill anyone squishy, but can still take quite a few hits
